## Run Examples Through Your Browser


```{r setup, include=FALSE, message=FALSE}
opts_chunk$set(fig.path="figure/", cache.path="cache/", fig.width=14.5, fig.height=8, fig.cap='', warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, tidy=FALSE)
require(shiny)
```

* First install Shiny if you haven't yet

```{r install, eval=FALSE}
if (!require(shiny)) {
  install.packages("shiny")
  library(shiny)
}
```

* Use runExample() to run the shiny tutorial examples

```{r ex1, eval=FALSE}
runExample("01_hello")
```
